content.question: A pulley has an outer and an inner rim. The inner rim has radius <math alttext="R sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and the outer rim has radius <math alttext="R sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>. A string is wrapped around each rim. The string wrapped around the inner rim is attached to a block of mass <math alttext="m sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and the string wrapped around the outer rim is attached to a block of mass <math alttext="m sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>. In this configuration, the pulley-blocks system is in rotational equilibrium. Which of the following equations is correct for this system?

choices.label: <math alttext="m sub 1 equals m sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="R sub 1, end sub, m sub 1, equals, R sub 2, end sub, m sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="R sub 2, end sub, m sub 1, equals, R sub 1, end sub, m sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="R sub 1, end sub, squared m sub 1, equals, R sub 2, end sub, squared m sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msubsup><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="R sub 1, end sub, m sub 1, equals, R sub 2, end sub, m sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>
